Articles.Content: Hello, i was wondering if there are any add ons that add the parts to make articulated rovers? i've got a few things i want to do with kethane and ores you see.

You know, I've downloaded a few mods to see what their parts were like and thusfar I haven't really found much in the way of rover bits. I think that's a bit odd considering rovers have been a thing for a couple versions now.

Maybe when more science parts/tools, repair or resources/mining make it into the vanilla game, there'll be more rover parts in peoples' mods.

Or maybe there's already lots of rover parts in some mods and I just haven't seen them for whatever reason.

But if you're lookin' for arms and/or claws and stuff, it seems KAS, MagicSmoke Industries and the old-ass Damned Robotics parts might suit you.
I was hoping for some catapillar tracks more than anything else, but thanks for the suggestions
